mapper.select: select * from (select rownum rn, tt.* from (select * from inquiry order by re_ref desc, re_seq asc) tt) where rn>=#{startNum} and rn<=#{endNum}
select count(*) as cnt from inquiry
mapper.insert: insert into inquiry values(inquiry_code.nextval, #{user_id}, #{inquiry_subject}, #{inquiry_content}, inquiry_code.currval, 0, 0, 0, sysdate)
mapper.update: update inquiry set inquiry_readcount = inquiry_readcount + 1 where inquiry_code=#{inquiry_code}
